languages.text: "Я не вижу скверны в твоей душе, {name}. Ты чист{mf||а} перед Императором, а посему я выношу оправдательный приговор и дарую тебе Его благословение в напутствие. Ступай и неси кару Его тем, кто отвернулся от Его заветов".

traits.locale_text: "Я не вижу скверны в твоей душе, {name}. Ты чист{mf||а} перед Императором, а посему я выношу оправдательный приговор и дарую тебе Его благословение в напутствие. Ступай и неси кару Его тем, кто отвернулся от Его заветов".
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "I see no sign of taint in your soul, {name}. You are pure before the Emperor, and thus I acquit you and grant you His blessing in parting. Go forth and bring His punishment to those who have turned their back on His word."
languages.original_text: "Я не вижу скверны в твоей душе, {name}. Ты чист{mf||а} перед Императором, а посему я выношу оправдательный приговор и дарую тебе Его благословение в напутствие. Ступай и неси кару Его тем, кто отвернулся от Его заветов".

traits.locale_text: "I see no sign of taint in your soul, {name}. You are pure before the Emperor, and thus I acquit you and grant you His blessing in parting. Go forth and bring His punishment to those who have turned their back on His word."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “我看到，你的灵魂没有任何污点，{name}。你在帝皇面前是纯洁的，因此，我在此宣判你无罪，并赐予你神皇的祝福。去吧，将祂的怒火带给那些胆敢背弃祂的教诲的人。”
languages.original_text: "I see no sign of taint in your soul, {name}. You are pure before the Emperor, and thus I acquit you and grant you His blessing in parting. Go forth and bring His punishment to those who have turned their back on His word."

traits.locale_text: “我看到，你的灵魂没有任何污点，{name}。你在帝皇面前是纯洁的，因此，我在此宣判你无罪，并赐予你神皇的祝福。去吧，将祂的怒火带给那些胆敢背弃祂的教诲的人。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「{name}、お前の魂には汚れがない。お前は皇帝の前で清らである故に無罪放免とし、別れの際は皇帝の祝福を与えよう。さぁ、主の言葉に背を向けた者達に、罰を与えに行くんだ」
languages.original_text: "I see no sign of taint in your soul, {name}. You are pure before the Emperor, and thus I acquit you and grant you His blessing in parting. Go forth and bring His punishment to those who have turned their back on His word."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、お前の魂には汚れがない。お前は皇帝の前で清らである故に無罪放免とし、別れの際は皇帝の祝福を与えよう。さぁ、主の言葉に背を向けた者達に、罰を与えに行くんだ」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «No veo rastro de corrupción en su alma, {name}. Es {mf|puro|pura} a ojos del Emperador, por lo que le absuelvo y le concedo Su bendición al partir. Traiga Su castigo a aquellos que han dado la espalda a Su palabra».
languages.original_text: "I see no sign of taint in your soul, {name}. You are pure before the Emperor, and thus I acquit you and grant you His blessing in parting. Go forth and bring His punishment to those who have turned their back on His word."

traits.locale_text: «No veo rastro de corrupción en su alma, {name}. Es {mf|puro|pura} a ojos del Emperador, por lo que le absuelvo y le concedo Su bendición al partir. Traiga Su castigo a aquellos que han dado la espalda a Su palabra».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Ich sehe in Eurer Seele kein Anzeichen von Verderbnis, {name}. Ihr seid völlig rein in Eurer Treue dem Imperator gegenüber. Ich spreche Euch frei und gewähre Euch zum Abschied seinen Segen. Zieht aus und tragt seine Strafe zu jedem, der seinem Wort den Rücken gekehrt hat."
languages.original_text: "I see no sign of taint in your soul, {name}. You are pure before the Emperor, and thus I acquit you and grant you His blessing in parting. Go forth and bring His punishment to those who have turned their back on His word."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe in Eurer Seele kein Anzeichen von Verderbnis, {name}. Ihr seid völlig rein in Eurer Treue dem Imperator gegenüber. Ich spreche Euch frei und gewähre Euch zum Abschied seinen Segen. Zieht aus und tragt seine Strafe zu jedem, der seinem Wort den Rücken gekehrt hat."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Je ne vois nulle trace de souillure dans votre âme, {name}. Vous êtes {mf|pur|pure} aux yeux de l'Empereur, je vous acquitte donc et vous accorde Sa bénédiction. Partez et châtiez en Son nom ceux qui ont tourné le dos à Sa parole. »
languages.original_text: "I see no sign of taint in your soul, {name}. You are pure before the Emperor, and thus I acquit you and grant you His blessing in parting. Go forth and bring His punishment to those who have turned their back on His word."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vois nulle trace de souillure dans votre âme, {name}. Vous êtes {mf|pur|pure} aux yeux de l'Empereur, je vous acquitte donc et vous accorde Sa bénédiction. Partez et châtiez en Son nom ceux qui ont tourné le dos à Sa parole. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Ruhunda herhangi bir lekeye dair iz görmüyorum {name}. İmparator'un gözünde safsın, dolayısıyla seni aklıyor ve ayrılırken sana O'nun lütfunu ihsan ediyorum. Yoluna devam et ve O'nun kelamına sırtını dönenlere O'nun gazabını yaşat."
languages.original_text: "I see no sign of taint in your soul, {name}. You are pure before the Emperor, and thus I acquit you and grant you His blessing in parting. Go forth and bring His punishment to those who have turned their back on His word."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhunda herhangi bir lekeye dair bir iz görmüyorum {name}. İmparator'un gözünde safsın ve dolayısıyla seni aklıyor ve ayrılırken sana O'nun kutsamalarını ihsan ediyorum. Yoluna devam et ve O'nun kelamına sırtını dönenlere, O'nun gazabını yaşat."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
